# sweet_aws_organization (Resource)

Aws Organization resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    sweet = {
      source = "sweet-security/sweet"
    }
  }
}

provider "sweet" {
  api_key = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
  secret = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
}

resource "sweet_aws_organization" "example" {
  account_id = "123456789012"
  role_arn = "arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/example"
  role_name_parameter_arn = "arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/example"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account_id` (String) Aws Root Account Id
- `role_arn` (String) Aws Role Arn
- `role_name_parameter_arn` (String) Aws Role Name Parameter Arn

### Optional

- `external_id` (String) Aws External Id
- `regions` (List of String) Aws Regions
